name: 费德里科·坎贝尔
name_full: 费德里科·坎贝尔 Federico Campbell

last_movies.title: 下加利福尼亚：时间的极限

introduction: Federico Campbell was born on 1 July 1941 in Tijuana, Baja California, Mexico. He was a writer, known for Bajo California: El límite del tiempo (1998) and Feria internacional del libro (2004). He was married to Carmen Gaitan Red and Margarita Peña. He died on 15 February 2014 in Mexico City, Mexico.BornJuly 1, 1941DiedFebruary 15, 2014(72)
